All Classes

Class Description
AbstractDAO<T>
The type Abstract dao - defines the common operations for accessing a table: Insert, Update, Delete, FindById, FindAll.
AddressValidator
The type Address validator.
Client
The type Client - entity in the database: has id, name, email, phone number and address.
ClientBLL
The type Client bll - business logic for client - validates the client to be added/updated into the database or for delete ensures that it exists.
ClientController
The type Client controller - opens the frame for managing clients and initializes listeners for the buttons - validates the input from GUI to be non-empty, creates a new Client and passes it to the ClientBLL for validation before making operations in the database.
ClientDAO
The type Client dao.
ClientNameValidator
The type Client name validator.
ClientScreen
The type Client screen - the GUI for managing Clients.
ConnectionFactory
The type Connection factory - this class contains the name of the driver (initialized through reflection), the database location (DBURL), and the user and the password for accessing the MySQL Server.
EmailValidator
The type Email validator.
InputValidationFailedException
The type Input validation failed exception - user defined exception for displaying personalized messages.
Main
The type Main - starts the application by instantiating the MainController.
MainController
The type Main controller - opens the principal frame for the application and initializes listeners for the buttons.
MainScreen
The type Main screen - the principal GUI.
Order
The type Order - entity in the database: has id, client id, product id and quantity.
OrderBLL
The type Order bll - business logic for order - validates the order to be added/updated into the database or for delete it ensures that it exists.
OrderController
The type Order controller.
OrderDAO
The type Order dao.
OrderQuantityValidator
The type Order quantity validator.
OrderScreen
The type Order screen - the GUI for managing Orders.
PhoneNumberValidator
The type Phone number validator.
Product
The type Product - entity in the database: has id, name and stock.
ProductBLL
The type Product bll - business logic for product - validates the product to be added/updated into the database or for delete ensures that it exists.
ProductController
The type Product controller.
ProductDAO
The type Product dao.
ProductNameValidator
The type Product name validator.
ProductScreen
The type Product screen - the GUI for managing Products.
ProductStockValidator
The type Product stock validator.
Validator<T>
The interface Validator.
